rolf01.title: Rolf
rolf01.description: Did you guys try out Player Unknown Battlegrounds? I highly recommend it!

options.yes: I've been meaning to check that out!
options.no: I don't play games based on adult fiction.

kris01.title: Kristoffer
kris01.description: The new Doom is the best first person shooter I've played in YEARS!

options.yes: I've been meaning to check that out!
options.no: I've shot enough demons for one lifetime.

harald01.title: Harald
harald01.description: Guys, Factorio is the most fun you can have building factories and shipping goods since the early 1900s.

options.yes: Wow, it's in post-apocalyptic setting? Sign me up!
options.no: My Steam catalog is full enough of games I'll never play.

terje01.title: Terje
terje01.description: The new Fifa is awesome! Come try it out!

options.no: I prefer watching paint dry over sports games.

are01.title: Are
are01.description: I got this new game called Ridiculous Fishing for my iPhone, it's amazing!

options.yes: I've been looking forward to that! I'll get it right now!

y0_c01.title: Rolf
y0_c01.description: Can I have tomorrow off? I'm going to China!

y0_c02.title: Mads
y0_c02.description: What if we make a web-game based on Reigns for our 5 year anniversary?

y0_c03.title: Client
y0_c03.description: These elements of the game are completely absurd! Make them more realistic and boring please!

y0_c04.title: Gamer
y0_c04.description: Fuck you, this game isn't free!! Please give me a free code.

y0_c05.title: Are
y0_c05.description: This prototype is awesome, maybe we should pitch it to Devolver?

options.yes: Yeah, our kids need to eat.

y0_c06.title: Are
y0_c06.description: Let's make a game about Alfie Atkins!

options.no: No, I would never play that.

y0_c07.title: Are
y0_c07.description: What if we made a game about the stock market where you could compete against your friends over who is the better capitalist?

options.no: I don't take much stock in that concept...

y0_c08.title: Mads
y0_c08.description: Out in the boonies where I come from we play this game called Basse. Wanna try it?

options.no: Work is about being miserable and making money!

y0_c09.title: Harald
y0_c09.description: I built a computer last night after work using only rubber bands and paperclips. What if we make a game about stuff like that?

options.yes: Great idea! I've always wanted to be MacGuyver.
options.no: Is there really a market for games like that?

y0_c10.title: Brosmind
y0_c10.description: Here are the initial graphics for your Eggggg game. What do you think, do we want it to be more wacky or less wacky?

options.yes: More! We went with Brosmind for a reason.
options.no: Yowsa, can you make it more like Alfie Atkins please?

y0_c11.title: Thomas
y0_c11.description: This code is like soggy pasta, mind if I rewrite it from 2000 lines down to 45?

options.no: Our deadline won't allow it unfortunately.

y0_c12.title: Kaja
y0_c12.description: We can't fund the whole project, but we'll give you half of what you asked and you can apply again next year.

options.yes: Please madam, we want some more.

y0_c13.title: Publisher
y0_c13.description: Wow, that's quite a development budget you've got there. Do you eat gold plated food in Norway?

options.yes: We'll do it for half the cost in half the time.
options.no: Our budget is our budget, take it or leave it.

y0_c14.title: Gamer
y0_c14.description: There's no audio in this app!! I want my money back.

options.yes: Sure, just ask Apple for a refund.
options.no: Did you check the mute switch?

y0_c15.title: Sales person
y0_c15.description: We have a revolutionary new app market place! Buy it!

y0_c16.title: 'Client'
y0_c16.description: I have the best idea for a game. Sign this NDA and make it for me! For free!

y0_c17.title: 'Client'
y0_c17.description: Have you guys heard about Farmville? I've got an even better idea. Zooville. It will make gazillions of dollars! It's fully funded.

y0_c18.title: 'Client'
y0_c18.description: Can you make a prototype for my game, and I'll pay you once it's funded!

y0_c19.title: Publisher
y0_c19.description: We really love your game and want to publish it. Just pay us a monthly retainer, and we'll promo the shit out of you!! WE HAVE A YOUTUBE CHANNEL!

options.yes: Wow, I wish we had a youtube channel.

y0_c20.title: Bendik
y0_c20.description: I want to make all the sound effects for your game just using sounds from my own mouth.

options.yes: I'm not sure that's a great idea..

y0_c21.title: Are
y0_c21.description: Let's make a game about vomit!

y0_c22.title: Kristoffer
y0_c22.description: Let's make this failed project a board game instead!

y0_c24.title: Kristoffer
y0_c24.description: I want to make a prototype of this idea before we get too far in development.

options.no: We have no time for that.

y0_c25.title: Are
y0_c25.description: Does anyone have time to put in some extra hours this week?

y0_c26.title: Are
y0_c26.description: Did you remember to fill your time sheets this week?

y0_c27.title: Inna
y0_c27.description: I want to add a dragon creature.

y0_c28.title: Terje
y0_c28.description: Is it okay that I work remotely from Australia for a few months?

options.no: Sorry, you're needed at the office.

options.yes: It's 2 PM! If this happens again you're fired!
options.no: Oversleeping until 2PM could happen to anyone.

y0_c30.title: Rolf
y0_c30.description: I finished this animation, but I think it's shit. Can I polish it more?

options.no: Are you kidding, this is great!
options.yes: Sure, we have time for another pass!

y0_c31.title: Kristoffer
y0_c31.description: I think it's starting to come together, but maybe we should do some user testing?

options.no: Why? We are users. We'll test it.

y0_c32.title: Lawyer
y0_c32.description: You are sued for stealing the game concept Reigns by Nerial Games.

y0_c33.title: Thea
y0_c33.description: I want to make a series of interviews with everyone in Hyper Games!

options.no: Please don't. Our english is too awkward.

y0_c34.title: Jim Sterling
y0_c34.description: This looks like an actual fucking video game!

y0_c36.title: Rolf
y0_c36.description: Maybe in stead of just cloning Reigns we should come up with something more unique?

options.no: But we only have 2 days to make it...
options.yes: Yes! Let's do the anniversary thing next year!

y0_c37.title: Mads
y0_c37.description: Stop adding characters to this game. I can´t draw all of them in time!

y0_c38.title: Harald
y0_c38.description: I want to make this great tool that will save us a lot of time in the long run!

options.no: Sorry, no time for that now

y0_c39.title: Are
y0_c39.description: So.. I just booked a booth at GDC in three months. Let's make a game to show there!

y0_c40.title: Badly drawn character
y0_c40.description: I don´t appreciate the way I am portrayed in this game

y0_c41.title: Client
y0_c41.description: I would like to use one of your employees as a clown for my childs birthday party.

y0_c42.title: Client
y0_c42.description: We want a game to teach our employees stuff!

y0_c43.title: Client
y0_c43.description: Can you make game for us to sell this product?

options.no: No, we just want to make indie games.

y0_c44.title: Kaja
y0_c44.description: Congrats! You were just granted $100.000 for your game.

y0_c45.title: EU bureaucrat
y0_c45.description: The commision would like you to fill out these 281 forms and sign them 10 times. We'll give you some money. Maybe.

y0_c46.title: EU bureaucrat
y0_c46.description: You have signed these documents using the wrong color pen. Could you please sign again on both sides, using all RGB colors?

y0_c47.title: Gamer
y0_c47.description: I love your games! Could I have an Eggggg poster signed by the development team?

options.no: No, but you can buy one!

y0_c48.title: Gamer
y0_c48.description: Your games are full of bugs. Can I have a refund?

y0_c49.title: Publisher
y0_c49.description: Multiplayer survival games are really hot right now. You should tweak your current project in that direction.

options.no: We make our own creative decisions.

y0_c50.title: Sound guy
y0_c50.description: Hi, I'm a dubstep producer. Do you need some music for your game?

y0_c52.title: Rolf
y0_c52.description: I love butter! Let's make a fort out of butter and live in it!

y0_c53.title: Mads
y0_c53.description: I messed up the GIT repo again :(

options.yes: Thats ok. Harald will fix it.

y0_c54.title: Unity rep
y0_c54.description: Time to pay up for those licenses!

options.no: Not until we get nested prefabs.

y0_c55.title: Are
y0_c55.description: Let´s buy some beers and play Secret Hitler!

y0_c56.title: Terje
y0_c56.description: Can we make a game about soccer now?

options.yes: Do we look like we like Soccer?

y0_c57.title: Client
y0_c57.description: We want you to make the next big gambling game. For kids.

y0_c58.title: Are
y0_c58.description: Maybe we should branch out from the agency Hyper and start a separate game studio?

y0_c59.title: Terje
y0_c59.description: Can I join the studio too?

y0_c60.title: Thomas
y0_c60.description: Maybe you need a developer who's actually used Unity before?

options.no: Nope! We'll keep on using Flash <3

y0_c61.title: Rolf
y0_c61.description: I can do all the things nobody else knows how to!

options.yes: OMG! That's just what we need!

y0_c62.title: Alexander Fornæss
y0_c62.description: Hey, you're stealing Rolf from Biometric Games!!

y0_c63.title: Kristoffer
y0_c63.description: I'm a game designer! Need help?

options.no: LOL! Is that really a job?

y0_c64.title: Harald
y0_c64.description: I just finished school. Will you hire me if I program a game for you in one day?

y0_c65.title: Mads
y0_c65.description: I've been making stuff for you for 4 years now. Maybe it's time to hire me?

y0_c67.title: Kristoffer
y0_c67.description: Maybe we should attend a game jam?

options.no: Maybe we should throw cash out the window.

y0_c68.title: Kristoffer
y0_c68.description: I have this idea about a rolling ball of light.

y0_c69.title: Nordic Game Conference
y0_c69.description: Morkredd just won the Indie Sensation Award!

options.no: We're not indie enough for that shit.

y0_c70.title: Spillprisen
y0_c70.description: Norwegian game of the year for small screens goes to Eggggg!

options.no: Only for small screens? No thanks.

y0_c71.title: Kristoffer
y0_c71.description: Our game uses too many buttons. We should limit ourselves to one button only.

options.no: No, we need even more buttons!

y2_mogul_beta.title: Gamer
y2_mogul_beta.description: Is the stock market game beta out yet?

y3_mogul_beta.title: Gamer
y3_mogul_beta.description: Still waiting for that stock market game beta!!

y2_redux.title: Are
y2_redux.description: I want to make a sci-fi survival game with dinousaurs and fighting.

y3_redux.title: Are
y3_redux.description: There's this new survival game out called ARK with dinosaurs and fighting. Should we continue with Redux ARK?

options.yes: Remove dinos and call it just REDUX!

y4_redux.title: Are
y4_redux.description: We released the REDUX beta, but people don't care...

options.yes: It just needs better code. Start over!

y3_trump.title: Terje
y3_trump.description: Did you see that guy with the hair is running for president in USA?

y1_news.title: Breaking news
y1_news.description: Edward Snowden just leaked classified information about global surveillance by the NSA.

y2_news.title: Breaking news
y2_news.description: Facebook just bought the VR company Oculus for $2 Billion.

options.no: Lol, as if VR will ever work well

y3_news.title: Breaking news
y3_news.description: Current trends predict the burst of the "indie bubble" #indiepocalypse

options.no: I'll believe it when I see it!
options.yes: What goes up must come down...

y5_news.title: Breaking news
y5_news.description: The most important games studio in the known universe, Hyper Games, is about to turn 5 years old.

y3_partybehaviour.title: Nordic Game Conference
y3_partybehaviour.description: The award for "Weirdest party behaviour" goes to a silly group of Norwegians.

y4_poop.title: Thomas
y4_poop.description: Let's play this extremely cheap but probably fun game about poop!
